email_subject: IBM's thin ThinkPads fit to a T
email_body:
Hey, it's not all bad news in the corporate world. One definite business success story is Big Blue's ThinkPad T series. These versatile and speedy thin-and-light notebooks share a sturdy, well-designed black case and come in so many configurations that you can find one that's right for just about any use. They also range in price from $2,199 to a hefty $3,499.  For a comprehensive look at this line of notebooks, check out our verdict.
